entities.name: aberforth
entities.description: Aberforth is described as Dumbledore's brother and a strange bloke. He is mentioned as someone Harry has only met once.

entities.name: dumbledore
entities.description: Dumbledore is mentioned as Aberforth's brother.

entities.name: voldemort
entities.description: Voldemort is described as the one who killed Dorcas Meadowes personally.

entities.name: dorcas meadowes
entities.description: Dorcas Meadowes is mentioned as someone Voldemort killed personally.

entities.name: sirius
entities.description: Sirius is described as having short hair when he was shown to Harry.

entities.name: wormtail
entities.description: Wormtail is described as the one who betrayed Harry's parents' whereabouts to Voldemort.

entities.name: harry potter
entities.description: Harry Potter is mentioned throughout the passage.

entities.name: moody
entities.description: Moody is described as having a heavily scarred and pitted face.

relationships.description: Wormtail betrayed Harry's parents' whereabouts to Voldemort, which ultimately led to their deaths.
